item.title: Overview of Christianity
item.description: In the name of God, the Lord of Mercy, the Giver of Mercy. Let me begin with the sincerest intention all for the sake of truth. Assalamu ‘Alaikum! (peace be upon you!) The life of Jesus (peace be with him) plays a pivotal role to both Christianity and Islam. The two religions believed Jesus (peace be with him) as the Messiah sent by God to the children of Israel. His divinity is the core belief of the majority of the Christian denominations around the world, but is rejected by the Qur’an (the holy book of Islam).

item.title: Trinity
item.description: Trinity is the name used by the trinitarian christians to refer to the nature of their God. Accordingly, God is composed of three separate beings in one essence or one Godhead. These distinct beings are God the Father, God the Son and God the Holy Spirit.
